description_of_product/service: CAD/EDA Tools Software Engineer for Test Chip Design
responsibilities: Development of EDA software tools and flows
goals_objectives: Support Intel's next generation process technology
required_qualifications: MS degree with 6+ months experience or PhD degree with 1+ years
Degree in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or Computer Science
6+ months experience in programming languages like Python, Tcl, C++
preferred_qualifications: 6+ months experience in EDA tools like Cadence Virtuoso, Synopsys ICV, Siemens Calibre
Experience with parameterized cells (PCells) or PyCell
